summary: This bill, S.1452, introduced in the Senate on April 10, 2025, aims to extend certain authorities granted under the Defense Production Act of 1950. Specifically, it seeks to amend Section 717(a) of the Act to extend its provisions from September 30, 2025, to September 30, 2026. The bill was introduced by Mr. Scott of South Carolina, with Ms. Warren as a cosponsor, and was referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
